00122 inline void CShapeControl::SetShapeTransform(const i2d::CAffine2d& transform)
00123 {
00124        m_shapeTransform = transform;
00125        if (m_shapeTransformMode != STM_VIEW){
00126               InvalidateTransforms();
00127               Invalidate(CS_CONSOLE);
00128        }
00129 }

00144 inline void CShapeControl::SetVisible(bool state)
00145 {
00146        if (m_isVisible != state){
00147               m_isVisible = state;
00148               Invalidate(CS_CONSOLE);
00149        }
00150 }

00155 inline const i2d::CAffine2d& CShapeControl::GetLogToViewTransform() const
00156 {
00157        if (!AreTransformsValid()){
00158               CalcTransforms();
00159        }
00160 
00161        return m_logToViewTransform;
00162 }
